events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report mentioning the car crash and damages.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim and begin communication with the claimant.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim report and assured the customer that their vehicle accident claim is being processed promptly.
Requested submission of accident photos, police report, and repair estimates from the customer to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all required documentation including accident photos, police report, and repair invoices.
Claims team began a thorough investigation into the vehicle collision to verify damages and liability.
Completed investigation and confirmed the accident details match submitted claims and supporting evidence.
A settlement proposal was prepared based on repair costs and policy terms and was sent to the claimant for review.
Customer responded favorably to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process.
The claim was officially approved for payment following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved vehicle repair costs was disbursed to the customer as per the agreed settlement.
The vehicle accident claim has been officially closed following settlement and payment issuance.
All claim documents and communications were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
